Text.Page:
Today I caught a glimpse of the argons' queen. They call her Shandra Manaya.

That's rightâ€”they speak. Or the smart ones do. Calling it speech isn't quite right, though. To my ears, it's eerie clicking mixed with words.

Did Shandra Manaya create the argons? If so, she must be a goddess. What chance do we have against an immortal argon?

I heard them mention a "shaper," perhaps that one might have answers for me.Put message away.
